text: ... in large part due to your work.

text: Now don't you think your fearis a small price to pay?

text: I told you attachments were dangerous.

text: You chose to marry the girl.

text: I did nothing to prevent it.

text: JOHN: [Angrily]Turn it off! Turn off the light!
title: A Beautiful Mind

text: - Why would you turn the light on?- What is wrong with you?
title: A Beautiful Mind

text: You have to go to your sister's.

text: JOHN: I left the car out in back.Take Commonwealth, no side streets.

text: ALICIA: John, I'm not going anywhere!
title: A Beautiful Mind

text: JOHN: When you get to your sister's,wait for my call.

text: - Get your things.- I'm not leaving!

text: I saw you on the slate,and I thought to myself:
title: A Beautiful Mind

text: I got myself into something.I think I might need some help.
